item.title: blog using org and hugo
item.description: References : https://ddavis.io/ Copied shamelessly from here* https://seds.nl/ My ulitmate plan Questions : I have made a base site using hugo static generator. The post are written using org-mode from emacs. The plugin `ox-hugo` converts the org file to markdown and places it to the posts folder of the hugo site folder. I have also used roam capture template so that the placeholder for tags and categories are perdefined in new org files.
